name: Space Shooter Alpha
description:
Thanks for checking out the first alpha for our first game!

This tentatively titled mobile Android game is a classic space shot-em-up built in Unity 2D designed to be responsive, fun and hectic with lots of replay value. Load into a stage from the star map, blast waves of enemies for awesome power-ups and clear your objectives to unlock the next stage. Clear every stage and find out what's waiting in the final stage...hmmmm I wonder what it could be.

We are planning on adding more stages, more power-ups, more enemies, progression and more. Please tell us what you think and share your ideas with us either in the discussion board below, in our Discord Server or on Twitter @MisfitLabsDev. Or you can follow our blog posts on our website.
